body:
- Various e-commerce, property management, and data migration projects. Contributed to established codebases, resolving issues and taking ownership of misaligned codebases to improve stability.
- Frontend and backend projects using React, NestJS, ExpressJS, and WordPress.
- Led and developed an end-to-end full-stack/Unity-based edutainment (education + entertainment) mobile game to teach Arabic to children, including a full backend service and frontend dashboard to track progress. Implemented an external in-app purchase flow, saving 30% on Google and Apple IAP commission fees.
